availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William E. Tabb (Mason County, KY, miller)

body.p: Dover, Mason County, Kentucky, miller. Kentucky native. Married to Cynthia E. Patton Tabb on November 6, 1840. Married to Sarah B. Evans Tabb on December 14, 1841. Father of Charles Tabb. Married to Amanda M. Elrod Tabb on May 6, 1846. Father of Ruth Tabb, Marcus Tabb, James Francis Tabb. Married to Mary J. Metcalfe Tabb on August 28, 1860. Miller in Dover in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Dover, District 3, p. 237.
The Evening Bulletin, Maysville, Kentucky, August 27, 1889, p. 3, https://www.newspapers.com/image/71103973/?terms=Tabb (accessed 16 May 2017).
